flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Picture frame comes die cut and we will teach you how to create your own unique style. you will have a great experience working with ribbons and beads decorating a handmade picture frame.
guide.introduction_rendered: Picture frame comes die cut and we will teach you how to create your own unique style. you will have a great experience working with ribbons and beads decorating a handmade picture frame.
guide.summary:
This is a beutiful picture frame. Project  was purchased at www.masterartkits.com We enjoyed every minute working to design this lovely picture frame. Try it and it will surely  be your favorite craft you ever made!!!
Express your creativity with a quali
guide.title: exquisite picture frame
